## AbstractResponseBuilder.enqueue() method

Enqueue the next audio

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
abstract enqueue(next: PlayableMedia, current: PlayableMedia): AbstractResponseBuilder<R>;
```

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  next | [PlayableMedia](./stentor-models.playablemedia.md) | Track to be queued |
|  current | [PlayableMedia](./stentor-models.playablemedia.md) | The current track playing |
